qas.question: What was the name of the event at which the iTunes Wi-Fi store was launched?
On what date was the iTunes Wi-Fi Music Store launched?
In what year was the iTunes Wi-Fi Music Store introduced?
Which Apple device has the ability to sync with iTunes via the phone network?

context: Apple debuted the iTunes Wi-Fi Music Store on <a1_0>September 5, <a2_0>2007<a2_0/><a1_0/>, in its Media Event entitled "<a0_0>The Beat Goes On...<a0_0/>". This service allows users to access the Music Store from either an <a3_0>iPhone<a3_0/> or an iPod Touch and download songs directly to the device that can be synced to the user's iTunes Library over a WiFi connection, or, in the case of an iPhone, the telephone network.
